snippet: Senate Majority Leader Harry Reid said Tuesday that he's received threatening letters at his home, with nearly all of them citing Scripture. He did not say who the letters came from....

headline.print_headline: Sen. Reid Says He's Received Mail Threats at Home
headline.main: Sen. Reid Says He's Received Mail Threats at Home

lead_paragraph: Senate Majority Leader Harry Reid said Tuesday that he's received threatening letters at his home, with nearly all of them citing Scripture. He did not say who the letters came from.
